content:
### Existing Structures

### Copper plate factory
Consists of the following entities:
-  Furnace (position x=61.0, y=-52.0) with fuel={'coal': 6}, furnace_source={'copper-ore': 49}, and furnace_result={'copper-plate': 47}
-  Furnace (position x=63.0, y=-52.0) with fuel={'coal': 5}, furnace_source={'copper-ore': 50}, and furnace_result={'copper-plate': 47}
-  Furnace (position x=65.0, y=-52.0) with fuel={'coal': 1}, furnace_source={'copper-ore': 50}, and furnace_result={'copper-plate': 78}

### Error Tips

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to furnace source being full
- Monitor the fuel and resource levels in the furnaces to avoid the "furnace source is full" warning. Consider managing the input resources more effectively to prevent bottlenecks.
